content.description:
Stem up the "corner" of the yoda head boulder to reach the lip. Pull the lip.

Be careful with fall potential, there is a drop off that'll add a good 20+ feet to your fall if you miss the pads and or have a bad spot.

This route is an absolute classic, it was full of skrittle on the FA but was definitely climbable and will just get better with traffic.

Here's a video story for the FA if you're interested in checking it out -

https

://youtu.be/08RzevRd8FM
content.protection: Pads/spotters. Big drop off in the fall zone
content.location:
Go to the Room to Shroom area. From Room to Shroom the "Yoda Head" Boulder is on the climbers right side of the canyon. Not far from Room to Shroom walk deeper into the boulder field. Once you're walking in you'll see it on your left side (right side if facing Room to Shroom)

The boulder should only be about 5-10 minutes away and is very noticeable.
